title: Extremely Low FPS on Mac Pro, Sierra Verison 10.12.5
body:
I have opened 2 tickets on this with no luck. 

My FPS on my Mac hovers around 15-20 FPS and when I engage it drops to 0-5 FPS so the game is completely unplayable. I have followed all the tips provided from Riot on optimizing for LoL. I did a completely clean install of Sierra OS and there is no improvement. All hardware was inspected by an Apple genius at the Apple store, so I am out of ideas. I read some chatter about this on an EU forum but no solution, so it seems like I am not alone.

Has anyone ran into this issue and found a fix?

replies.body:
Same for me here. Playing on my mac since 3 years without problems.
Past days having high FPS drop, sometimes unplayable (under 20 fps).
Macbook specs:
2,6 GHz Intel Core i7
16GB RAM
NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2048 Mo

Nothing weird on my mac on already checked everything.
I'm pretty sure it's about the last MAJ, since it consumes > 150% CPU
even on launcher since this MAJ.

Please guys ... we cannot even play

I've opened tickets like this before and nothing ever happens. Every patch seems to have the same fps lag problem for a few days. my normal 60 drops to 15-20 in fights. It seems to fix itself after a few of the smaller patch fixes.

Sorry this has been such an issue, and still unresolved.  :(  If you've got a ticket open, our tech guys would be the best to continue helping out on this, though.   Just let them know the results of your troubleshooting, and they'll keep working with you in your ticket.
